end_date.description: The date the allocation ends on.

hard.description: Indicates if the allocation is a Hard Allocation (“true”) or Soft (“false”).

minutes.description: Total minutes the resource is allocated over the date range.

notes.description: User entered notes about the allocation.

percentage.description: Percentage that a user is allocated compared to their capacity between the start and end date of the allocation.

start_date.description: The date the allocation starts on.

workspace_id.description: `workspace_id` will only be included in the response if `workspace` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

workspace_resource_id.description: The id of the workspace resource that the allocation will be associated with.
